<file>
00001| // IMPORTANT: When adding new env variables to the codebase, update this array
00002| export const ENV_VARIABLES: EnvVariable[] = [
00003|   {
00004|     name: "PEK_LOGIN",
00005|     description: "Логин пользователя личного кабинета ПЭК",
00006|     required: true,
00007|     instructions: "Перейдите на [kabinet.pecom.ru](https://kabinet.pecom.ru) и введите ваш логин от личного кабинета. Если у вас нет логина, зарегистрируйтесь на сайте ПЭК."
00008|   },
00009|   {
00010|     name: "PEK_API_KEY",
00011|     description: "API ключ доступа к ПЭК",
00012|     required: true,
00013|     instructions: "Войдите в [kabinet.pecom.ru](https://kabinet.pecom.ru) → Регистрационные данные → Ключи API. Создайте новый ключ и скопируйте его значение."
00014|   }
00015| ];
00016| 
00017| // SUPABASE/DATABASE VARIABLES (uncomment and add to ENV_VARIABLES array when adding database features)
00018| // {
00019| //   name: "DATABASE_URL",
00020| //   description: "Supabase PostgreSQL database connection string for migrations and server-side operations",
00021| //   required: true,
00022| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Database → Connection string (URI format).\n Copy the full postgresql:// connection string.\n Make sure to replace [YOUR-PASSWORD] with actual password"
00023| // },
00024| // {
00025| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL",
00026| //   description: "Supabase project URL for client-side authentication and API calls",
00027| //   required: true,
00028| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Data API → Copy the 'Project URL -> URL' field (format: https://[project-id].supabase.co)"
00029| // },
00030| // {
00031| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY",
00032| //   description: "Supabase anonymous/publishable key for client-side authentication",
00033| //   required: true,
00034| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → API Keys → Copy 'Legacy API keys → anon public' key"
00035| // }
00036| 
00037| export interface EnvVariable {
00038|   name: string
00039|   description: string
00040|   instructions: string
00041|   required: boolean
00042| }
00043| 
00044| export function checkMissingEnvVars(): string[] {
00045|   return ENV_VARIABLES.filter(envVar => envVar.required && !process.env[envVar.name]).map(envVar => envVar.name)
00046| }
</file>
